msbt.message: Heyyy! Running into you first thing in the morning like this means it's gonna be a great day.
What kind of a day will today be? It's off to a good start—I can tell you that!
It's that time of day when I really want a snack, but I don't want to ruin my appetite either
Ahh, just look at that sky. Mother Nature always picks such on-trend colors for the season
Did you see the sunset? I want to paint one of the walls in my house that color so I can look at it forever!
Ahh This is when I finally start to feel awake. The night is young, !
Can't sleep, huh? <10_4 />Why would you want to, anyway?
Ah, what a sunrise. Feels like today is gonna be fire!
Another day in paradise, or as I like to call it,
Clear sky, smooth sailing. Living the dream, !
Don't you just love when the wind kicks up a flurry of cherry blossoms? Nature has serious style.
Not sure I like the looks of those clouds,
Look at all that snowit's like a blank canvas for the day.
Not letting the snow slow you down at all, eh?
I just want to go splashing through all of these puddles, but I don't do my own stunts.
Guess what.<10_4 /> It's raining! This kind of weather really splashes my puddle, !
Well, it's raining. It's not good for my hair, but it's great for taking moody selfies.
Hey, I was just thinking about you. And now you're here! Call me the Summoner!
Ah, another sunny, beautiful day in paradise. SO glad I decided to live the island life
Check it out—the cherry blossoms are falling again! This is nature's most photogenic season.
I don't know why it's so gloomy today—I'm feeling great! Get with the program, weather.
This snow isn't cooling you off at all, . You're on fire!
This is kind of embarrassing to admit, but I thought this was a TROPICAL island,
It's really coming down today, huh? Well, don't let it cramp your style, . Stay fabulous!
Just listen to that rain coming down. It's music to my ears! Like a ribbit to the rhythm of nature
I don't like to think of rain as the sky crying. It'll ruin the sky's mascara.
Do you think it's fate that we became such good friends?<10_4 /> Me too!
Perfect weather and a random meet up with my bestie. What could be better?
It's like all of is dyed pink and I'm here for it.
It's like the sky didn't have any clean laundry, so it just threw on a frumpy gray sweatshirt
I don't mind the cold, as long as I've got this heavy blanket of snow to keep my soul warm.
It doesn't feel cold out here at all when you're around.
Sometimes I wish they made, like, extra-large umbrellas.One of those would be perfect for a situation like this.
Look, I know I'm a frog, but I think more folks should open themselves up to just getting drenched by rain!
What am I doing out in the rain?<10_4 /> It's called method acting! I'm playing a guy who forgot his umbrella.
I'm just out enjoying the cool breezes of
There's nothing like on I'm just basking in it, .
Hey, can I run my life story past you real quick? I'm working on my autobiogra— Oh, another time, then.
Ha HA! We meet again!<10_4 /> Ordid that first meeting happen in my dream this morning
I was just wondering if I'd run into you! I guess that means I was thinking about you. Lucky me!
I'm just making it up as I go along, but I know one thing for sure.Moving to was the best decision I ever made. Because you live here!
